document_data.mainbody:
The '''Eternal Flame Pavilion''' was a temple located in the [[City of Brass]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

The Eternal Flame Pavilion was found in [[Furnace (district)|the Furnace ward]] of the city.
document_data.Description: This mosque was sheathed with finely beaten [[gold]].
document_data.Activities: The Eternal Flame Pavilion was dedicated to [[Agni]], a fierce god who destroyed everything he touched with purifying flames. Since the priests of Agni preached the ideal of redemption and immortality, the worship of Agni was wildly popular among the common [[efreet]], but only tolerated by the [[noble efreeti|noble efreet]] who preferred to keep their subjects hard at work instead of praying.
